attention1.ptxt: Before servicing fuel system, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service:F9Q .

s1.ptxt: Disconnect negative (–) cable at battery.
Hoist vehicle.
Remove exhaust center pipe.
Remove rear propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
With cable connected, detach parking brake cable clamp from fuel tank cover referring to Parking Brake Cable Removal and Installation:Disc .
Disconnect fuel filler hose and breather hose from filler neck referring to Fuel Tank Inlet Valve Removal and Installation:F9Q .
For 5 door model, disconnect fuel pump connector (1).
Due to absence of fuel tank drain plug, drain fuel tank by pumping fuel out through fuel tank filler.
Use hand operated pump device to drain fuel tank.

item.ptxt: Do not force pump hose into fuel tank, or pump hose may damage fuel tank inlet valve.
Never store fuel in an open container due to possibility of fire or explosion.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect fuel pipe joint and fuel hoses (1) from fuel pipes (2) referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:F9Q .
Support fuel tank (1) with jack (2) and remove its mounting bolts.
For 3 door model, lower fuel tank a little so as to disconnect connectors (1) of fuel pump (2) and sub fuel level sensor (3), then remove fuel tank.

item.ptxt: When connecting joint, clean outside surfaces of pipe where joint is to be inserted, push joint into pipe till joint lock clicks and check to ensure that pipes are connected securely, or fuel leak may occur.
Never let the fuel hoses touch the ABS sensor harness (if equipped).

s1.ptxt: If parts have been removed from fuel tank, install them before installing fuel tank to vehicle.
Raise fuel tank (1) with jack, and connect connectors of fuel pump and sub fuel level sensor and clamp wire harness.
Install fuel tank to vehicle.

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to use new fuel tank bolts when installing.

s1.ptxt: Connect fuel filler hose (1) and breather hose to filler neck as shown in figure, and clamp them securely.
Connect fuel feed hoses (1) to each pipe as shown in figure, and clamp them securely referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:F9Q .
Install parking brake cable clamp to fuel tank cover referring to Parking Brake Cable Removal and Installation:Disc .
Install rear propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Install exhaust No.1 pipe referring to Exhaust System Components:F9Q .
Connect negative (–) cable at battery.
Check fuel leakage referring to Fuel Leakage Check Procedure:F9Q .
